channel.title: Adding more than 1 line of dialogue using dialogues.cfg
channel.description:
I feel pretty ashamed of myself for asking this, and Im not happy. I can do it in client.java, but I dont really know how to set options in there. Dialogue knowledge:
[b]Client:[/b]Adding more than 1 line, linking 1 to another, setting options, but not having them lead to a different one.
[b]Dialogues.cfg:[/b]Adding 1 line-dialogues, setting options, having options lead to another dialogue, etc... But not more than 1 line per dialogue ID.
So thats my problem. If you could help, thatd be great. If not, thats ok. Thank you for the help :)
